Protocols Documentation¶

This page contains the Protocols Package documentation.

The protocols.com_chan Modules¶

class ComChanCheck¶

An extremely simple credentials checker. It check if the client is already in the connections pool and that the password is the good universal one (stupid password check but better then nothing).

requestAvatarId(credentials)¶
